meanings.sent1: The children played on the monticules in the park.
meanings.sent2: The farm had several monticules where the sheep grazed.
meanings.sent3: The ants worked together to build tiny monticules in the sand.
meanings.sent4: The monticules of books on her desk seemed to reach the sky.
meanings.sent5: The monticules of colorful leaves in the yard made a beautiful sight.

meanings.sent1: The castle was perched on top of the monticules overlooking the village.
meanings.sent2: The stage was set on the monticules for the outdoor concert.
meanings.sent3: The monticules of pillows on the bed made it look like a throne.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed off the monticules of the canyon walls.
meanings.sent5: The monticules of sand in the desert shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: She found a monticules of colorful stones by the riverbank.
meanings.sent2: The gardener raked the fallen leaves into monticules for disposal.
meanings.sent3: The monticules of laundry waiting to be folded seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent4: The monticules of presents under the tree brought joy to the children.
meanings.sent5: The monticules of snow outside the window sparkled in the moonlight.
